org.magdaaproject.utils
Class ChartUtils

java.lang.Object
  org.magdaaproject.utils.ChartUtils

public class ChartUtils
extends java.lang.Object

a utility class which exposes methods related to the formatting of a AndroidPlot chart

getDateDomainFormatter

public static java.text.Format getDateDomainFormatter(long divisor)
get a formatter that can be used on date domain values

Parameters:
divisor - the divisor used to shrink the domain values before adding to the series
Returns:
a formatter which uses the TimeUtils.DEFAULT_SHORT_TIME_FORMAT to format dates

getRangeBoundaries

public static java.lang.Float[] getRangeBoundaries(com.androidplot.series.XYSeries series)
get the minimum and maximum values for the range values

Parameters:
series - the series containing the y 'range' values
Returns:
an array with two elements containing the minimum, element 0, and maximum, element 1, range values
